Name: Squarena
About the game: Have you ever wanted to prove to your friends and family who the best colorfully decorated square combatant is? You can do that and more in Squarena! Squarena is a skill-based party game with an emphasis on physics combat. The game mechanics support ease of entry with a high skill ceiling. Enjoy a variety of arenas and variations in this 2D physics arena shooter, where your character's health determines its size. The lower your health, the smaller you become which makes it easier to maneuver and avoid bullets, but it also means the recoil from shooting will have a bigger impact on you! Don't forget that you have your teleport and shield abilities to use and try to get the edge in the battle as well! Features: 2-6* player battles Expanding list of maps that offer varied gameplay Powerups Physics-enabled world Customizable game rules Unlockable skins, cosmetics & content Sport based mode ...and more! * 5-6 player battles can only use up to 4 xbox gamepads at a time, then use alternate types for the other two players.
